title.rendered: “IDF Airstrike Takes Out Hezbollah Commander Sami Taleb Abdullah in Major Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a Hezbollah command center from which it managed attacks from southeastern Lebanon, and eliminated its commander, Sami Taleb Abdullah.

Last night (Tuesday), in an airstrike by fighter jets, a command center of the terrorist organization Hezbollah was attacked in the Jouiya area, from which the organization managed attacks from southeastern Lebanon toward Israeli territory, and Hezbollah unit ‘Nazar’ commander Sami Taleb Abdullah was eliminated.
Sami Taleb served as one of the senior commanders of Hezbollah in southern Lebanon.
For many years, he planned, promoted, and executed numerous terrorist plots against the citizens of the State of Israel.
In the strike, three additional terrorists from the organization who were alongside him were also eliminated.

Attached is documentation from the strike: https://bit.ly/3Vk04MO

Attached is the identification card of Sami Taleb Abdullah: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC120620247649743635
